content: While the remaining 9 million lives in the early stage of our pipeline includes another large plant in the Midwest with approximately 4.5 million lives, and regional health plans across the nation in varying lines of business. These include, number one; a continued focus on evolving and improving our core offering, which is the on track Whole Health Plus program that focuses on that 2% to 5% of plan members who have undiagnosed or untreated behavioral health conditions, along with chronic physical comorbidities. During the third quarter, we recorded revenues of $2.8 million and 85% year-over-year decrease due primarily to the loss of two large customers we've previously discussed.
